org.apache.cassandra.config

Class UTMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.config.UTMetaData

  • public final class UTMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    Defined (and loaded) user types. In practice, because user types are global, we have only one instance of this class that retrieve through the Schema class.
